/* EstimateMapper.estimateListByGrid 조회 */ select ROWNUM() as rnum , count(*) over() as total_count , a.business_name , a.estimate_date , a.estimate_id , (select code_name from code where code_id = a.estimate_status_cd) as estimate_status_cd_name , a.vendor_name , a.manager_name , (select code_name from code where code_id = a.valid_date_cd) as valid_date_cd_name , b.item_id , b.item_name , b.due_date , b.price , b.quantity , b.supply_amount , b.vat_amount , b.total_amount , (select username from user where user_id = a.reg_id) as reg_username , date_format(a.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_dt from estimate a left join estimate_item b on a.estimate_id = b.estimate_id where 1=1
order by a.reg_dt desc , a.estimate_id asc LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

/* EstimateMapper.findNextEstimateId 조회 */ select case when max(estimate_id) is null then concat('EST', date_format(now(), '%y%m%d'), '00001') else CONCAT( 'EST', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d'), LPAD(SUBSTRING(MAX(estimate_id), 10) + 1, 5, '0') ) end as estimate_id from estimate where estimate_id like concat('EST', date_format(now(), '%y%m%d'), '%')

/* EstimateMapper.findByEstimateId 견적서아이디로 조회 */ select estimate_id , estimate_date , valid_date_cd , estimate_status_cd , manager_id , manager_name , manager_tel_no , manager_fax_no , vendor_id , vendor_name , vendor_tel_no , vendor_fax_no , business_id , business_name , representative_name , registration_number , business_address , business_tel_no , business_fax_no , business_type , industry_type , remark from estimate where estimate_id = #{estimateId}
